body:
Sarith , 

Thank you so much for your help , I learnt a lot from you about electric lighting simulation with HB :) . for the lighting unit model , it's made by my friend Youmna , she is talented architect here's her FB page ( [https://www.facebook.com/moony.kalid](https://www.facebook.com/moony.kalid)) . I'm happy that you liked the model :) 

wish you all the best , 

Mona
